org.ff4j.conf

Class XmlParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ff4j.conf.XmlParser

  • public final class XmlParser
extends Object
    Allow to parse XML files to load Feature.
    Author:
    Cedrick Lunven (@clunven)
